reviewText: The videos do not work.

Slides are a real mess. The class is unorganized and assumes that the student has previous knowledge on the subject. For instance, half of first few classe uses football examples. I am not american. I know nothing about football. On the next week, it starts discussing grammar and comma splits. The lecture never defines what a comma split is but ask us to identify one.
Awful. This course appears to be a plug for the instructors book.
Personally, I appreciate the instructor's time and effort in these courses, but it is a waste of time and money for the content I expected.

​course is too long, given too much reading material and there are too many discussion boxes and quiz, instructor use too many quotations of the writer to make it difficult and boring, you don’t get what are you getting, please make it simple and short so student like who’s the native language is not English can understand easily.
Just posts several resources.  Not teaching.
I only signed up to audit this course.  Why am I being charged and there is no number to call? I hope this reaches you.
The trainer is so annoying! He does not seem to talk but to shout all of the time!
This is not well put together. For a course on writing, it certainly lacks structure.

So much information - relevant or irrelevant and crammed into this course. Organization of the elements is poor. I know what empathy is no need to reexplain every word. Or repeat every quote. Tests are irrelevant, no systematic order, presentation material not nice to look at... just overall confusion. Ironically from someone who speaks about effective writing.

The course is really weak! I just finished two other courses, one by Google and another by Arizona State University, and comparing these two to this one is like comparing gold to dust! The videos are boring and unengaging, the instructor is boring, the design f the course is bad, the quality of the video and audio is low, everything is just TERRIBLE! I was so motivated to take the whole specialization, but after just checking the first course, I lost any interest I got (yes, that's how bad it is!) The only good thing about this course is that it has many downloadable resources; that's why I am giving it 2 stars instead of 1 star.
I liked some of the terms/concepts I learned in this class. But overall, I felt it was less about writing and editing and more about the circumstances around doing them well.

The course is too slow. The material covered is often irrelevant. The illustrations are completely off and the message that the professor is trying to convey does not get through very easily. It is painful to follow.
N​ice.

I​ did not finish this specialty or this course because it was not what I expected.  An honest name for the course would be: How to Spin Words So People See What You Want Them To See.  I would like to be able to remove this course from my in-progress list.
t​oo many references to make note of. Could've been simpler.
N​ot what I thought it was. Not interested in pursuing this course.
Good course, but not what I was looking for.

If only the content hadn't been this great, I wouldn't have gave it a 3 star because the structure of the course is so confusing for starters. You'll get the dynamics as you progress tho overall really nice and worth the purchase

Overall, I liked the pacing and how the concepts were taught and illustrated. Some of the questions in the quizzes weren't relevant to the concept taught, but overall, I liked the content of this course.

There is alot of extra information that you can read and it makes for an interesting class. But the assignments are useless. There could be better assignments where you actually get graded on a rubric not just class discussions.
Not as interactive as I thought it would be.
it was a good one.
Quite good
If you are looking for a straightforward kind of grammar class and writing style, you may get bored.

The format was a little confusing. There is a lot of content to cover here. This is my 16th course through Coursera, and this was one of the most challenging in terms of amount of content. I challenge anyone with a day job to get through this in 4 weeks - can't be done - unrealistic. I've been a lawyer for 42 years. When I saw that this course was designed for law school students, primarily, I thought surely, I already knew all of this. As a lawyer I have specialized in writing, but I learned a lot. Thanks, Dr. Barry!
There's an emphasis on sports examples and legal writing that's somewhat out of balance for a generalized course but there's still plenty of val
great course for anyone who wants to improve their writing!
This course is very important to anyone who want to start writing.w
Interesting and helpful course for those who want to improve their writing skills and increase their chances of being good at work or getting a job that they want.
T​his was quite challenging. It changed my way of managing time;  and how in every kind of writing, the writer should put in effort to make their message come across to the reader.
Es muy intrresante y entretenido en cada contenidp que tiene
Helped a lot!
I enjoyed this class, very informaative
very interesting this course and qque helped me to classify and know more about different sources that can be used for various situations or things.
it's very good
Very engaging and clear material. One request would be to include opportunity for people to submit written work which could be graded and feedback could be given.

A solid course with reasonable workload and lots of excellent additional resources and readings. The only downside was the repetitive nature of the lecture videos/class clips/readings - the same material was recycled multiple times - helpful if you didn't get it the first time, but needless where easily understood.
Good and Short. Recommended for anyone interested in improving their writing skills while at home.

I​ apprehensive about this course at the start. I believed that it would be boring but applied for it because I wanted to improve my writing so bad. This was an amazing decision. I love all the course materials, the videos and everything. I wish teachers at my college taught us like this.
T​he actual time needed for this courses is far more than what listed on the page. Required to read a lot of books, article and video. Ultimately, the time allocated for one week is very compact
I learned so much from this course. Kudos to the Instructor.
I can say this course gives me something basic, just basic, but very useful.
nice

It is very nice designed course to improve your language learning. The course is mainly about how to be better at getting better. However, I find it also difficult for the beginners to follow due to many excerpts that are really difficult to understand completely. I would recommend this course for intermediate level.
A much needed course for every field!
Great course!

A strong starter course for anybody looking to get back into the word of the English language. Easy to follow & full of useful information to give yourself a new boost in the field or refresh your memory from past educational experience in English. Parts of this course deviate a little from English into the Law route as Prof. Patrick Barry is overall, a Professor of Law. However, all the relevant information is there & you gain a little insight into how writing is used in the world of Law for the most beneficial reasons. It is something you may not have thought about with language & writing; how it is so vastly important in every aspect of work.

Great class! I enrolled thinking I would brush up on grammar and stayed for the engaging instructor and wonderful conversations about how to be a better, more persuasive writer and why and where--professionally and personally--it's important. My only previous experiences with completing an online course have been through LinkedIn. This was a completely different, far superior educational experience in which I not only learned but absorbed the material.  Four and not five stars because there was virtually no real engagement with other students, even when prompted.
Very good information and well structured. Energetic, and focused on actionable lessons. I recommend this class to anybody who needs to do persuasive business writing or teaching.
It was so useful
A very informative class indeed. I would want to continue with the remaining courses for this specialization!

I wasn't aware that this is focused on those who are pursuing law. I am content and creative writer. However, learned a lot from the content of this course. I loved the examples and Prof. Barry's way of handling a class. I liked the Youtube videos and recommended readings too.
It was a wonderful course to take and be apart of, I would do it again.
Really good materials. The examples and reading recomendations are awesome.
Wish the course was a little bit harder.
The course is a complete Bootcamp for all writers, It helped me to understand small concepts, Quizzes and Assignments certainly helped me to grasp all the knowledge.
It was thoughtful and useful.

This course introduced me to some new ideas and made me aware that what I have been using all this time have been some efficient writing techniques. I loved the sessions 'notes on nuance' and 'punctuation and professionalism'.

It is a good course and the resources given are very interesting and amusing. The only problem I found is that the course itself tells you that it is aimed to a wide audience, so there is no need for a writing background. But several quizzes require a previous knowledge of literature, so you will need to google some quotes to be able to tell the author and works that the quiz is asking for.
It was really an wonderful experience.I learned a lot of things through this course.Thank you such much!
Thank you for an interesting experience !
good course to understand writing techniques
The instructor really introduced new concepts in quite an interesting manner that successfully hooked me with the lessons. moreover, the course content seems to be phenomenally compiled.
Very insightful for non-native speaker audience!
Loved this class.  I put in more time then I have because i was motivated and interested in the assignments.

This course is full of interesting and useful information, including videos and reading material. The facilitator is knowledgeable and likable (which is important when you're staring at them onscreen for so long). Highly recommend!
This course is quite extensive, replete with reading materials.

It was such a valuable course. I’ve been working to improve my English writing skills, I’ve learnt about:- What questions should I before I start writing.- How to structure my texts.- How to use text connectors to improve my writings.- What are the most common grammatical errors in English.- What are the most common punctuation errors.I am very grateful to my tutors for this interesting experience.Elsa Inés Orsi. Balcarce, Argentina.
Perfect course to bring a revolution in your ordinary writing to make it extraordinary.
It really helps to write better.
Professor Partick Barry is awesome, energizing my spirit.
Best writing course I've ever found. Prof. Barry is a brilliant teacher.
Thanks, Mr. Patrick Barry for giving such instructions through your videos. Everything has been cleared.

Excellent, well-paced introduction into learning how to write professionally: for both beginners and experienced writers. Workload isn't too heavy, and the instructor is very direct yet empathetic with his teachings. You really may have quite a few epiphanies while going through this series.

I believe this course will help me write differently. Although its methods are a bit confusing we are also explained that it is the best way of learning. This may be true. I am very motivated to put my pen back into my present and past papers.
Wonderful course! I truly enjoyed it, learned a lot, and was immediately able to apply what I learned.
Excellent course ! the best course I have taken thus far reviewing the basics was fun! thank you professor
excelent

course

This course is great! I recommend this to people who want to know more about writing. It has incredible material and tools to help you improve not only your writing but also your idea of what writing is.
This course has taught me a lot that I did not know about. I will be applying these to becoming a better writer and editor.
Simply eye opening.

Excelente curso, si uno está interesado en curtir ciertas prácticas de escritura y además de engrosar la bibliografía dedicada para estos aspectos.

The Uni of Michigan is such an amazing university. Professor Barry is one of the best teachers on my list from now onward. His way of teaching is very unique. He is very experienced and a good nature teacher. He knows well how to engage students even far away hundreds of kilometers. Eventually, Thanks Coursera to give me this opportunity. Strongly recommend this course to non-native English writers, especially Asian people.
The course brought me back to days when writing was fun. Prof. Barry was clear, concise and sometimes entertaining.
An excellent course for those who want to be a good writer.
I loved taking this course I feel like I learned a lot .too bad there are no official credits towards a degree .

Excellent course, deepened my love of writing and language and has made me even more confident in my writing abilities. I've got a long reading list of recommendations from this course. Definitely a life-changing course for all people.
Taking the course, taking notes and exercises has challenged me to be more intentional with my writing. I have also been able to note writing weaknesses  and work on improving them.
nice and simple

very insightful and interesting

An excellent course and a job well done by Professor Patrick. This is a must-have course even for seniors because it covers important concepts and ideas that are fundamental for mastering the art of writing.
Great
Everything was great in this course. The content and the way of teaching of the professor were just excellent!

I'm glad with all the materials that offer by this course. I could even find the a few of materials that is benefical for copywriting/ad campaign projects. It's amazing because this course is like kill two birds with one stone :) Hope i could join this kind of course next time :)
G​reat course. One of, if not the best courses I've taken.

I enjoy taking classes that challenge you.  Writing and Editing is the type of class you will scream at your computer but determining it was not going to beat me I met the challenge and passed with a 90.   If you need a class to kick start your skills, challenge your personal growth and take this class.
The course is professional, perspicuous, and productive.
excellent

The lectures are engaging and funny. You really do learn a lot. The samples/related literature cover a wide range, and you'll notice that they're kept updated, too, which is awesome. It's great if you wanna brush up on your grammar or need some ideas to be more creative.

I got on to this course to improve my writing.  This first course totally met my expectations;  the structure of the course in which the weekly core topic together with other segments such  as Punctuation and Professional, Nuances, Good Sentences, delivered me to the next level of writing better through the great teaching by Prof Barry. The various teach media used - the teach videos, Prof Barry's reference books and many useful links for readings, the polls and quizzes  was just right and effective. The sharing of writings by great writers all along the course exposed me to what great writing is.  Thank you, Prof. Barry.
The instructor make you want to rewrite everything you have ever wrote to any one.
Mr Barry is a captivating educator. Have enjoyed his content, though also enjoyed seeing him stand in front of his classes and inspire them. All the best to you.
It is an excellent course that offers deep insights into the importance of words, it's usage in professional writing, and the impact it makes. I've learnt a lot from the course. Thank you Coursera.
A great course to review and revise some writing basics and to learn something new.
Too good. I enjoyed the course. I feel proud, being part of this course.
A lot of excercises and examples, interesting course
I've learned more about writing in this one course than in my entire college experience. Take it.
Professor Barry is skilled and compassionate in teaching the writing course.  He's very clear with how he discuss concepts and make learning easier.  And he's got a good taste in good sentences.
T​his course really helped me learn to be intentional in my writing. I can't wait to go write something and apply all my new skills, tricks, and techniques to my work.

good

This course is incredible. The professor Patrick Barry will enrich your love for writing and teach you things you didn't know about. I loved it. It fueled my passion.

Thanks a lot Professor Patric Barry this was one of the most exciting course i have done i really benefited without a doubt from the books and references you gave in class

This course is truly helpful for those writers who want to write an engaging piece for their own or other's blogs...and there were tons of excellent resources that helped me to improve a lot! Huge THANKS to Professor Patrick Barry, and looking forward to learn more from you...

After five decades of writing one would have thought that there might have been a few things in this course that I had already learned, or didn't need to know. But, that wasn't true even an iota. I relished every moment of every lesson, from contemplating the provocative question, "What value am I bringing to the reader?" to exploring the value of the particular in great writing. One total surprise...I learned to love learning grammar. How did that happen?!?

The course is very helpful for both my professional and personal life. I get to improve my productivity, enjoy more readings and writings, and make a meaningful impact on my society just with the power of writing and editing. Big thanks to Professor Barry and Coursera!
one of the best courses which i have come across with.
Realmente aprendí mucho!

I really want to appreciate and thank Professor Barry for his
wonderful lessons. His lessons help me understand how to use words effectively
in order to create attractive sentences. I greatly enjoyed the videos of him
lecturing in his classes. I am also grateful for getting access to a wide range
of books and other resources which are very valuable. By effectively studying
Professor Barry’s lessons, I am starting to gain confidence in writing. I have
learned a lot from Course 1 and now I am so excited to continue Course 2 of Good
with Words: Writing and Editing Specialization.
interesting, amazing :)

I loved the course. It was very engaging and immersive. I was able to learn many new techniques from this course. Anyone who wants to improve their writing should definitely do this course.

I really enjoyed this course. I liked the pace and the material. The teacher was very interesting, thought-provoking, and entertaining in a good way, which kept the course flowing at a good pace. The only issue I had was at the beginning when I didn't know how the structure of the course worked. So nothing to do with content, but course structure. This is kind of stupid on my part, but I listened to all of the videos in Week 1. It was a lot of material and I couldn't figure out how the course was organized. This took me hours. So perhaps I could suggest a short tutorial on how to take the course.
Excellent course and teacher.
excellent course for any domain

I loved it; Professor Barry is my idea of what a teacher should be - entertaining, interesting, caters to every age group.The course made me re-think a lot of my writing, and how I want to go forward making the transition from technical writing to content writing. Best part is I've already started using much of what I've learnt in writing work for others.
Full of interesting and useful insights. Will certainly improve my writing.

Great course to learn about  Writing and Editing. I highly recommend this course.
yes this course was very useful for us .

reviewText: Great course! as a philologist, I'm already familiar with most of the concepts, but I still found great food for thought in this course.
Enlightening, insightful and inspiring

I enjoyed Professor Barry in this course. He was very good at explaining the information and used great examples. I also liked the supplementary materials provided with the course. Combined together will aid any individual in increasing their writing skills to be more effective and efficient.

I didn't expect the course to turn out to be so useful, informative, well organized and easy to understand. I was very motivated to learn and enjoyed every bit of it, Highly recommend it to aspiring writers!

This course will take your writing to a whole new level. By far the most inspiring, compelling, and down-to -earth scholar I’ve ever come across _ Patrick Barry is an academic on a mission to trim the flab of the overly cluttered legalese writing.Hanne Nordlander
One of the best online courses I have ever done, both in structure and content.
Amazing class!

Mister Barry, you are very good!!!

I am encouraged to read more and look for sentences I like.  I can dissect these sentences and compare them to the lectures on what makes a good sentence. The Resource Library has an abundance of books and articles available to students that is worth more than the price of the course.
An excellent course that enlightens, strengthens and challenges the attendee to be a better writer.

Professor Barry, I appreciate your teaching style, and your desire to share your excellence and experience of how to be a better writer. I will be ordering Good with Words, so I can digest your guidance again and again.
great instructor and great course.
excellent
Proud to be here
Amazing instructor,great matierals,many opportunities to learn how to be a better writer.Very interesting and amazing course.
This was an exceptional course—content, structure, and delivery were all fantastic. I look forward to the next course in the series.

I really enjoyed the Writing and Editing: Word Choice and Word Order, by Patrick Barry. I really enjoyed the reading materials, discussion boards and  video lectures that he used to help drive specific writing points, communicate grammar efficiently, and to use our creativity to "write sentences that nobody else could write". These skills can apply to any career to help when driving a point, or expressing a view, and sharing our opinions in a streamlined and authentic way.  I also enjoyed cover letter suggestions for diversity and standout statements that can help reel in any suiters.
A very inspiring and much needed course that will start you on a journey that was important and ignored.
Fun and informative. Easy to take. Great instructor.
So much wisdom in so short a time. This course is highly recommended.
Excelente
Excellent course, interesting and engaging with very practical tips on how to improve your writing.

This is a wonderful course. I took this up out of curiosity, in order to figure out how much better can I write? I already considered myself a good writer. But, Professor Barry's course is designed to teach at ALL levels. I have started looking at words with new eyes. Highly recommend this course to ALL, but especially those who think that they are already good with words!
Wonderful course! I greatly improved my writing skills and feel much more confident now.
nice course to undertake,am grateful
The instructor does an amazing job. The material is concise, energetic, and catchy.
Good
Professor Barry packs a lot of great writing concepts into this course.  He is entertaining as well as insightful about good writing.
Thank you Mr. Barry! I learned a lot from you in this course, and I'm a fan of your books

Amazing course with lots of useful information! It is simple, well structured, and easy to follow. Professor Barry was born to be a teacher. His patient teaching and his clear explanations are a true inspiration not just for students but for other teachers as well. I liked that he kept the videos short, yet detailed enough to catch my attention. I even used some of the techniques presented in this course for one of my recent lectures.

Professor Barry has a great teaching style that will keep you engaged. I truly appreciated the vast variety of examples because connecting what you learn to the real world always seems to make it stick more. So glad I challenged myself to try something new!
Thank you so much!
It is amazing the things I have learned here. Professeur Barry is a good teacher. He helps me to understand all the  topics very well. The materials he brings are worth reading.
Excellent course for people who want to express themselves better.
If you want to become a more-polished writer, you need to take this course. Even if you have extensive experience in writing, you will learn new aspects about how to become a better writer.

This is a great course for writers at every level! I'm a graduate student in the humanities, so of course I had fairly decent writing skills already, but this gave me a much needed little boost in skill and motivation. Try it, whether you're a non-native speaker who wants to learn the basics, or a polished writer who just wants a few more tips and hints!
very good for introductory writing course

Professor Barry is an amazing mentor. He created a world where the students can vicariously experience an engaging atmosphere to learn. The editing tips and strategies are so worth the time spent listening to his lecture.

Absolutely wonderful and engaging course on Improving one's command over the ENGLISH LANGUAGE - written in particular. I was totally bowled over by the erudition, the quizzes, the resources, and the lectures. The instructor was  nonpareil. I wished I had done this during my halcyon years.

It was a really good course. The concepts were given in a way that I could easily understand. I found various interesting topics and many books that I would love to read. Totally worths the time spent on it.
Great course overall! I loved that I learned a lot about writing strategy and not just mechanics. I wasn't expecting that, and I think it was the most valuable piece of the course.
thanks so much for this course. It was really instructive and Easy to follow, ALL the readings are interesting and engaging.
This course will change the way you look at grammar.
I really enjoyed the learning materials and the way Professor Patrick Barry explains everything.
Amazing. Simply brilliant!
It's an amazing course [but time consuming] for both beginner writers like me and writers who might want to check on why they are not yet unique in their work

I learned a lot about how to become a better writer in a relatively short duration. Working professionals should consider joining this course as the knowledge of good writing acquired can really help you advance your careers. Terrific course contents and teaching by Professor Barry.
Amazing experience. I understood everything perfectly. Very detailed explanations. Great Job.
What I have learned in this class exceeded my exception!

Great class on writing with helpful observations on different fields of writing and general good habits. There were also great sections on grammar where I learned new things that will be very useful to crafting better sentences and prose. Another note, I really loved the diversity and range of the examples the instructor, Patrick Barry, uses. If you pay attention you might learn some insights about life too!
Very informative and pushes you to devolop your reading and writing skills
Super useful, my favorite specialization on Coursera yet!
Engaging, informative, and worth every second of my time!
I am really excited.

O curso é incrível. Conteúdo interessante, apresentado de forma didática e leve. O professor é didático e engajado. Apesar de ser dedicado a alunos do curso de Direito da Universidade de Michigan, pode ser aplicado a qualquer área do conhecimento. As dicas sobre o uso da língua inglesa são muito boas e proveitosas. Recomendo este curso para todos(as) que desejam escrever de forma persuasiva.

Tips, techniques and grammar asides, the most important thing I've learned is: writing well is a force of persuasion. And I enjoyed sampling a wide range of good writings, works that I wouldn't have encountered otherwise.
Thorough. Very!

Thanks for this amazing course to everyone who made it. I enjoyed going through materials, book recommendations and doing really interesting assignments. Also, big thanks for letting us repeat the assignment over again:)
I feel very confident in my writing abilities after taking this course. Thank you!

thank you so much , It was an amazing experience .
